** Superb quality - 100% WORTH DL'ing **

I absolutely luv these movies, they scared the shit out of me when I was growing up :)
"Ok Resurrection not so much :-\", that movie kind of spoiled the legacy in my opinion, but hey, it's just wicked to finally watch them in 1080p.

Ok this torrent only has 60/70 seeds now and 300+ leeches which isn't brilliant, "but", it still averaged around 500KB/s for me which isn't bad considering. And my connection is only 16Mb/s, so my actual absolute max DL speed is 2MB/s!
So 500KB/s or 0.5MB/s with 5 times as many leeches as seeds.... I'm happy with that :)

Thanks so much FiNEHD, I'll keep seeding for a good few weeks :)
